trait.name: Age
trait.text: Khenra mature quickly, reaching adulthood in their early teens. Khenra initiates are usually the youngest in a crop, completing the trials by their late teens. Even without a violent death, they rarely live past 60.

trait.name: Alignment
trait.text: Most khenra lean toward chaotic alignments. They have no particular inclination toward good or evil.

trait.name: Size
trait.text: Khenra have similar builds to humans. Your size is Medium.

trait.name: Khenra Weapon Training
trait.text: You have proficiency with the khopesh (longsword), spear, and javelin.

trait.name: Khenra Twins
trait.text: If your twin is alive and you can see your twin, whenever you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll. If your twin is dead (or if you were born without a twin), you can't be frightened.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Khenra.
